definition: A term used to describe someone who tends to have a positive outlook on life, often expecting favorable outcomes and emphasizing the bright side of situations. It is commonly used to refer to individuals who maintain an optimistic attitude, even in challenging or uncertain circumstances.

examples.german: Sie hat eine optimistische Einstellung zum Leben.
examples.english: She has an optimistic attitude towards life.

examples.german: Trotz der Schwierigkeiten bleibt er optimistisch.
examples.english: Despite the difficulties, he remains optimistic.

examples.german: Die optimistische Prognose hat sich bewahrheitet.
examples.english: The optimistic forecast has proven to be true.

examples.german: Er ist optimistisch, dass alles gut wird.
examples.english: He is optimistic that everything will be fine.
